== Indoor (603014) ==
      
Indoor is a village in the [[Mundgod ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 1094.99 hectares and harbouring 959 households with total population of 4124 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MUNDGOD]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 2102 and female population is 2022. Scheduled Caste Population is 851 and Scheduled Tribes population is 415. Census Location Code of the village is 603014<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate male population: 1489 (70.84%)
* Literate female population: 1190 (58.85%)
